def draw_spider(leg_size, body_size, mouth, eye):
    lleg = ['', '^', '/\\', '/╲', '╱╲'][leg_size]
    rleg = ['', '^', '/\\', '╱\\', '╱╲'][leg_size]
    lbody = '(' * body_size
    rbody = ')' * body_size
    eye *= 2 ** (body_size - 1)
    return f'{lleg}{lbody}{eye}{mouth}{eye}{rbody}{rleg}'

L_LEGS = ["", "^", "/\\", "/╲", "╱╲"]
R_LEGS = ["", "^", "/\\","╱\\", "╱╲"]
                                  
def draw_spider(legs, body, mouth, eye):
    eyes = eye * ( 1 << body-1 )
    return f'{ L_LEGS[legs] }{ "("*body }{ eyes }{ mouth }{ eyes }{ ")"*body }{ R_LEGS[legs] }'

exoskeletons = ["Ce n'est pas un insecte...",
                                             "^%s%s%c%s%s^",
  "/\\%s%s%c%s%s/\\",
                                 "/╲%s%s%c%s%s╱\\",
            "╱╲%s%s%c%s%s╱╲",
                                              "...and it's also not a bug."]

def draw_spider(leg_size, body_size, mouth, eye):
    left, right = [eye * (2 ** body_size//2)] * 2
    return exoskeletons[leg_size] % ('(' * body_size, left, mouth, right, body_size * ')')
